info.title: Catalog API
info.description:
Methods for collecting product/sku catalog data, categories, brands and other information.

All content that comes between {{}} keys must be replaced with the correct data before performing the request.

Common parameters that must be changed in most VTEX requests
{{accountName}} => Store account name
{{environment}} => The environment that will be called. Change for vtexcommercestable or vtexcommmercebeta
{{X-VTEX-API-AppKey}} => Located in the headers of the requests, user authentication key
{{X-VTEX-API-AppToken}} => Located in the headers of the requests, authentication password

get.description: Retrieves the Category Tree of your store. Get all the category levels registered in the Catalog or define the level up to which you want to get.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: categoryLevels
parameters.description: Value of the category level you need to retrieve

text/plain.example: policyref="/w3c/p3p.xml",CP="ADMa OUR NOR CNT NID DSP NOI COR"

Title.title: Title
Title.description: Text used in title tag for Category page

Description.title: Description
Description.description: Text used in meta description tag for Category page
Description.default: Discover our range of home appliances. Find smart vacuums, kitchen and laundry appliances to suit your needs. Order online now.

AdWordsRemarketingCode.title: AdWordsRemarketingCode
AdWordsRemarketingCode.description: Shows the specific code for the AdWords remarketing platform

LomadeeCampaignCode.title: LomadeeCampaignCode
LomadeeCampaignCode.description: Shows the specific code for the LomadeeCampaign

FatherCategoryId.title: FatherCategoryId
FatherCategoryId.description: ID of the parent category, apply in case of category and subcategory

ShowInStoreFront.title: ShowInStoreFront
ShowInStoreFront.description: If true, Category is shown in the top and side menu

IsActive.title: IsActive
IsActive.description: If true, Category page becomes available in store

ActiveStoreFrontLink.title: ActiveStoreFrontLink
ActiveStoreFrontLink.description: If true, Category links become active in store

ShowBrandFilter.title: ShowBrandFilter
ShowBrandFilter.description: If true, Category page displays a Brand filter

post.description:
Amplifies a cart data by associating attachments to SKUs.

FieldTypeId.title: FieldTypeId
FieldTypeId.description: Field Type can be 1 - Text, 2 - Multi-Line Text, 3 - Número, 4 - Combo, 5 - Radio, 6 - Checkbox, 7 - Indexed Text, 8 - Indexed Multi-Line Text

FieldGroupId.title: FieldGroupId
FieldGroupId.description: Numerical ID of the Group of Specifications that contains the new Specification

Position.title: Position
Position.description: The current Specification position in comparison to the others

IsFilter.title: IsFilter
IsFilter.description: If the Specification can be used as a Filter

IsRequired.title: IsRequired
IsRequired.description: If the Specification is required or not

IsOnProductDetails.title: IsOnProductDetails
IsOnProductDetails.description: If the Specification will be  shown on the Product screen in the specification area

IsStockKeepingUnit.title: IsStockKeepingUnit
IsStockKeepingUnit.description: If the Specification is applied to a specific SKU

IsActive.title: IsActive
IsActive.description: If the Specification is active or not

IsTopMenuLinkActive.title: IsTopMenuLinkActive
IsTopMenuLinkActive.description: Shows if the Specification is shown in the main menu of the site

IsSideMenuLinkActive.title: IsSideMenuLinkActive
IsSideMenuLinkActive.description: Shows if the Specification is shown in the side menu
